SCTX - Script Source:
scriptname mwBMColonyTimerScript

short currentday
short dayspassed
short gidarmove
short servday
short colonyservice
short estate1
short estate2
short estate3
short startday

begin Gamemode

	if servday==0&&getstage fbmwco4>=50
		set servday to GameDaysPassed
	endif

	if GameDaysPassed - servday>=3 && colonyservice<3 && colonyservice!=0 && GetStage fbmwCO4 >=50
		if colonyservice==1
			Message "Construction on the colony has progressed..."
			set colonyservice to 3
			set fbmwCOAdvancement.colonyservice to 3
			SetStage fbmwCO4 80
		endif
	endif

	if GameDaysPassed - servday>=3&&colonyservice<3&&colonyservice!=0 && GetStage fbmwCO4 >=50
		if colonyservice==2
			Message "Construction on the colony has progressed..."
			set colonyservice to 4
			set fbmwCOAdvancement.colonyservice to 4
			SetStage fbmwCO4 90
		endif
	endif

	if GetStage fbmwCO1<50
		return
	endif



	If( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 0 )
		set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 1
	endif

	If( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState >= 1 )
		If( gidarmove == 0 )
			fbmwGidarREF.PositionCell -28, 180, 32, 0, RavenSRockVSGidarSVerothanAsSHouse
			fbmwGaminREF.PositionCell 776, 4, 66, 0, RavenSRockVSMineSEntrance
			fbmwSabinusREF.PositionCell -24, 138, 38, 0, RavenSRockVSSabinusSOraniusASHouse
			set gidarmove to 1
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 1 )
		if ( dayspassed == 0 )
			set currentday to GameDay
			set dayspassed to 1
		endif
		if ( dayspassed <= 3 )
			if ( currentday != GameDay )
				set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1 
				set currentday to GameDay
			endif
		endif
		if ( dayspassed > 3 )
			set dayspassed to 0
			set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 2
			if ( GetStage fbmwCOAdvancement >= 0 )
				SetStage fbmwCOUpdate 10
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 2 )
		if ( GetStage fbmwCO2 >= 90 )
			if ( dayspassed == 0 )
				set currentday to GameDay
				set dayspassed to 1
			endif
			if ( dayspassed <= 3 )
				if ( currentday != GameDay )
					set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1
					set currentday to GameDay
				endif
			endif
			if ( dayspassed > 3 )
				SetStage fbmwCOUpdate 20
				set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 3
				set dayspassed to 0
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 4 )
		if ( dayspassed == 0 )
			set currentday to GameDay
			set dayspassed to 1
		endif
		if ( dayspassed <= 3 )
			if ( currentday != GameDay )
				set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1 
				set currentday to GameDay
			endif
		endif
		if ( dayspassed > 3 )
			set dayspassed to 0
			set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 5
			SetStage fbmwCOUpdate 30
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 9 )
		if ( dayspassed == 0 )
			set currentday to GameDay
			set dayspassed to 1
		endif
		if ( dayspassed <= 3 )
			if ( currentday != GameDay )
				set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1 
				set currentday to GameDay
			endif
		endif
		if ( dayspassed > 3 )
			set dayspassed to 0
			set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 10
			SetStage fbmwCOUpdate 40
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 11 )
		if ( dayspassed == 0 )
			set currentday to GameDay
			set dayspassed to 1
		endif
		if ( dayspassed <= 2 )
			if ( currentday != GameDay )
				set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1 
				set currentday to GameDay
			endif
		endif
		if ( dayspassed > 2 )
			set dayspassed to 0
			set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 12
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 13 )
		if ( dayspassed == 0 )
			set currentday to GameDay
			set dayspassed to 1
		endif
		if ( dayspassed <= 3 )
			if ( currentday != GameDay )
				set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1 
				set currentday to GameDay
			endif
		endif
		if ( dayspassed > 3 )
			set dayspassed to 0
			set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 20
			fbmwGidarREF.PositionCell -195.465, -9.815, 137.121, 0, RavenSRockVSGidarSVerothanAsSHouse
			fbmwSabinusREF.PositionCell -91.973, -66.313, 164.140, 0, RavenSRockVSSabinusSOraniusASHouse
			fbmwGaminREF.PositionCell 327.068, -25, 135.6, 0, RavenSRockVSMineSEntrance
			fbmwAproniaREF.PositionCell 846.221, 486.647, 179.991, 0, RavenSRockVSBar
			SetStage fbmwCOUpdate 50
		endif	
	endif

	if ( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 20 )
		if ( GetStage fbmwCO12a == 50||getstage fbmwco12==110 )
			if ( dayspassed == 0 )
				set currentday to GameDay
				set dayspassed to 1
			endif
		endif
		if ( dayspassed <= 2 )
			if ( currentday != GameDay )
				set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1 
				set currentday to GameDay
			endif
		endif
		if ( dayspassed > 2 )
			if ( GetStage fbmwCO12a == 50||getstage fbmwco12==110 )
				set dayspassed to 0
				set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 21
				SetStage fbmwCOUpdate 60
			elseif ( GetStage fbmwCO12 == 110 )
				set dayspassed to 0
				set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 21
				SetStage fbmwCOUpdate 60
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState == 23 )
		if ( dayspassed == 0 )
			set currentday to GameDay
			set dayspassed to 1
		endif
		if ( dayspassed <= 3 )
			if ( currentday != GameDay )
				set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1 
				set currentday to GameDay
			endif
		endif
		if ( dayspassed > 3 )
			set dayspassed to 0
			set fbmwCOAdvancement.ColonyState to 30
			SetStage fbmwCOUpdate 70
		endif
	endif


	if estate1==1 && GetStage fbmwCOEstate < 40
		SetStage fbmwCOEstate 40
		set startday to GameDaysPassed
	endif
	if GameDaysPassed - startday>=2 && fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate < 31 && estate1==1
		set fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate to 31
		set startday to GameDaysPassed
	endif
	if GameDaysPassed - startday >=3 && fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate == 31
		set fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate to 34
		SetStage fbmwCOEstate 50
		StopQuest fbmwCOUpdate
	endif

	if estate2==1 && GetStage fbmwCOEstate < 40
		SetStage fbmwCOEstate 40
		set startday to GameDaysPassed
	endif
	if GameDaysPassed - startday>=2 && fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate < 32 && estate2==1
		set fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate to 32
		set startday to GameDaysPassed
	endif
	if GameDaysPassed - startday >=3 && fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate == 32
		set fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate to 35
		SetStage fbmwCOEstate 50
		StopQuest fbmwCOUpdate
	endif

	if estate3==1 && GetStage fbmwCOEstate < 40
		SetStage fbmwCOEstate 40
		set startday to GameDaysPassed
	endif
	if GameDaysPassed - startday>=2 && fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate < 33 && estate3==1
		set fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate to 33
		set startday to GameDaysPassed
	endif
	if GameDaysPassed - startday >=3 && fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate == 33
		set fbmwCOAdvancement.colonystate to 36
		SetStage fbmwCOEstate 50
		StopQuest fbmwCOUpdate
	endif

end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 32 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
